---
title: "GeoStyle"
---

***Bienvenidos y bienvenidas a GeoStyle!!***

```{r, echo=FALSE}
pacman::p_load(tidyverse, leaflet)

leaflet() %>% 
  addProviderTiles(providers$Esri.WorldImagery) %>% 
  addMarkers(lat = -33, lng = -71, popup = "Estación") %>% 
  addCircleMarkers(lat = -33, lng = -71.01, popup = "Vegetación estudiada", 
                   color = "yellow", fillColor = "yellow", radius = 30)

```
